metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Statistics is the science of analyzing data.
content.html: Statistics is the science of analyzing data.

content.text: When we have created a model for prediction, we must assess the prediction's reliability.
content.html: When we have created a model for prediction, we must assess the prediction's reliability.

content.text: After all, what is a prediction worth, if we cannot rely on it?
content.html: After all, what is a prediction worth, if we cannot rely on it?

content.text: We will first cover some basic descriptive statistics.
content.html: We will first cover some basic descriptive statistics.
